analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0x9c2c064f9514b871fb8fd55cbbec5c9ab7ce24f6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0x9c2c064f9514b871fb8fd55cbbec5c9ab7ce24f6.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x9c2c064f9514b871fb8fd55cbbec5c9ab7ce24f6.sol#62-63) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'Price' of BALL.setPriceRate (/unique_contracts/0x9c2c064f9514b871fb8fd55cbbec5c9ab7ce24f6.sol#161) is not in mixedCase
